sourcesContent:
Order Summary

Order ID: {{ order.id }}

Order Date: {{ order.createdAt | date: 'medium' }}

Name: {{ order.name }}

Address: {{ order.address }}

Status: {{ order.status }}

Order Items

{{ item.food.name }}

Price: {{ item.food.price | currency: 'INR' }}

Total Price: {{ order.totalPrice | currency:'INR'}}

Live Order status

Order Status: {{ currentStatus }}
